doc.title: Homebase Functionality
doc.text: This option (a DWord bit mask) determines the functionality of base buildings in a scenario. The base building is the one with the flag.

row.col: Lorries are automatically emptied and any gold in the base building or in contained objects is automatically sold.
Allied clonks can recharge life energy at the base.
Objects can be bought in the base.
Objects can be sold at the base.
The entrance is blocked for hostile clonks.
Clonks are extinguished in the base building.
All bits set: the default behaviour.

doc.author: Sven2
